articles.description: England suffer another disappointing defeat in Brendon McCullum's first one-day international in charge.
articles.title: England in India: Brendon McCullum suffers defeat in first one-day international in charge

articles.description: England confirm a positional switch with fly-half Fin Smith making his first Test start while Marcus Smith moves to full-back.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: England pick fly-half Fin Smith to face France

articles.description: Real Madrid legend Marcelo announces his retirement from football at the age of 36.
articles.title: Marcelo: Real Madrid legend retires from football aged 36

articles.description: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim says it was his decision to take the "risk" of not signing experienced players in the January transfer window.
articles.title: Man Utd taking 'risk' by not signing experienced players, says Ruben Amorim

articles.description: Liverpool and Tottenham go head to head on Thursday in their Carabao Cup semi-final second leg - with both managers aiming for a first final in English football.
articles.title: Liverpool vs Tottenham Hotspur: Ange Postecoglou relishes 'big occasion' for Carabao Cup semi-final

articles.description: BBC Sport columnist Phoebe Schecter says that Saquon Barkley will be huge in Super Bowl 59, but Jalen Hurts will bear the brunt of the pressure to deliver victory for the Philadelphia Eagles.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2025: 'Jalen Hurts will be reason Eagles win or lose Super Bowl - pressure is on him'

articles.description: Michael Van Gerwen has criticised world champion Luke Littler for his poor time keeping after the 18-year-old arrived 45 minutes late for a media day in Belfast.
articles.title: Luke Littler: 'He's not a baby anymore' - Michael Van Gerwen on world champion

articles.description: Chelsea striker Samantha Kerr denies showing hostility towards a police officer "because of his whiteness".
articles.title: Sam Kerr: Footballer denies 'whiteness as insult' against police

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at the standout stars who have excelled in the Six Nations over the past 25 years.
articles.title: Six Nations: Who rivals Antoine Dupont as tournament's greatest player?

articles.description: Manchester United defender Lisandro Martinez has suffered a cruciate knee ligament injury which the club believe is set to rule him out for the rest of the season.
articles.title: Lisandro Martinez: Manchester United defender suffers cruciate knee ligament injury
